title: Tropical Atmos
description: 33 seamlessly looping jungle atmosphere audio files. In this collection you´ll find high quality field recordings featuring ocean waves, crickets, frogs, birds, rain and thunder at day and night times. All recorded in India, Indonesia and Thailand.
longDescription:
33 seamlessly looping jungle atmosphere audio files. In this collection you´ll find high quality field recordings featuring ocean waves, crickets, frogs, birds, rain and thunder at day and night times. All recorded in India, Indonesia and Thailand. The majority of these atmos come in short and long versions (Approx. 30 sec and 1 minute).


Demo: https://youtu.be/KItJVEApdGU

technicalDetails:
Audio Tracks: 33 

Audio Cues: 33 

44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs 

Seamless Loops 

22 Minutes Total (Non-looped) 

Engine Compatibility: 4.15, 4.16, 4.17


Intended Platform: All
